extendedInfo.description: Get breaking news, weather and traffic alerts from Southwest Florida wherever you are with FOX 4 In Your Corner app. FOX 4âs app offers extensive coverage of the stories that go beyond the headlines holding the powerful accountable and fighting for everyday people. From FOX 4 Rising with Miriam Zamorano and Meteorologist Jamie Kagol to FOX 4 News at 6PM and 10PM with Patrick Nolan and Emily Dishnow, our app provides you Southwest Florida news throughout the day powered by fow4now.com App features include: -The latest weather forecast from your Storm Patrol 4 with Vipir Radar from Jim Syoen, Liza Fernandez, and Meteorologists Jamie Kagol and Michelle Cunningham. -Local and state politics and government including updates from Tallahassee -Your iContribute photos, including Storm Patrol Weather pictures -News, sports and weather photos -Videos from our latest newscasts, as well as web exclusive videos -Traffic updates for your commute - All 4 In Your Corner Investigations, Troubleshooter reports, Viewerâs Voice reports, Special Assignments, Consumer Reports, and 4 Your Health segments -Station contests and promotions -A way to submit your story or photo to our station via iContribute -All stories and videos about everything absolutely awesome about Southwest Florida with Paradise TV Plus, you can easily share this content and connect to your friends and family using the Facebook feature on our app!

reviews.title: Worth the download
reviews.comment: Works nicely. Great for local weather & news
